description: Adds tags to a resource group with the specified Amazon resource name (ARN). Existing tags on a resource group are not changed if they are not specified in the request parameters. To run this command, you must have the following permissions:

parameters.name: Arn
parameters.description: The Amazon resource name (ARN) of the resource group to which to add tags.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags to add to the specified resource group. A tag is a string-to-string map of key-value pairs. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon resource name (ARN) of the tagged resource.
